meanings.definition: A relative on the father's side.
meanings.sent1: My agnate, Uncle Joe, always tells funny stories about my dad.
meanings.sent2: My agnate cousin, who looks just like my father, visited us last weekend.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, my agnate brought a huge cake shaped like a toolbox.
meanings.sent4: In our family tree, my agnate is like a sturdy branch that connects us to our ancestors.
meanings.sent5: The old photo album is full of pictures of my agnate relatives from generations past.

meanings.sent4: The agnate connection between the two families was evident in their shared customs.
meanings.sent5: The agnate bond between the brothers was unbreakable, despite their differences.

meanings.sent1: My agnate, Grandpa John, taught me how to fish when I was young.
meanings.sent2: I have many agnates in my family who always gather for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: My agnate brother always challenges me to a game of chess on Sundays.
